media:group.media:title: Animating someone elses artwork
media:group.media:description:
Me and mclydeus exchanged art and then animated eachothers respective frame! mclydeus also made the background! this was super fun and very challenging to animate in this style! please go give her some love!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6ThMb5Rt70BVmVAv464qgg
also this is the art I made that she animated!:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f26C7XWQejE

media:group.media:description:
